s1-intro-text-1: As part of this project and a token of our appreciation we would like to present to the Warhorse team the physical award that was created by fans. Not as an industry prize but as something different. Something from the players themselves. A symbol that their work mattered so much to us. That it reached us.
s1-intro-text-2: We are not an official organization. We are not critics. We are not a jury. We are just players.
s1-intro-text-3: And sometimes the most meaningful recognition doesn't come from a stage. It comes from the community that lived inside the world your hard work and dedication built.
s2-text: With this long-standing slogan we want to say that regardless of anything we value this game for the way it truly touched our hearts. We deeply appreciate the inmense effort and love poured into its creation: most thrilling story plot, challenging mechanics, easter eggs and humor, NPCs, animation and music, performances of the actors and the overall atmosphere. We cherished every moment of this remarkable game being fully aware of how much work was done for us. As fans from all corners of the world we value the dedication as KCD2 holds a special place in our hearts.
s5-title: Express your gratitude, leave a message to Warhorse team
s6-subtitle: While working on the design, our amazing design team carefully considered many different options and brainstormed various ideas. Many of the ideas were so good that we decided to mention them here. Please check out the creation process.
